case.title: Sweet girl seeks 420 friendly guy - 40 (brooklyn)
case.text:
I posted yesterday and I realized too late that I didn't explain the situation. I am a Brooklyn girl seeking a ltr with an awesome guy who is 420 friendly. I'm looking to go on dates where we smoke and hang a little bit just to see if there is chemistry.
A little about me:
40 swf Very tall at 6'2 Creative Earthy into yoga and holistic stuff
I'm looking for a guy close to my own age 35-50 who is also seeking an ltr
We can just do the "meet for coffee" thing too...
I'm tempted to write "no pic no reply", but it's CL you are all spammed so much I get your reticence but do just send one...
Ok, now that's clear let's try to have some fun!
